topics.title: Coping with Anxiety
topics.author: Alex Johnson
topics.content: I've been feeling really anxious lately, especially about school. Does anyone have tips for managing anxiety during exams?

replies.author: Taylor Smith
replies.content: I've found that deep breathing exercises really help me. Try the 4-7-8 technique!

replies.author: Jordan Lee
replies.content: Have you tried meditation? There are some great apps that can guide you through short sessions.

topics.title: Sleep Issues
topics.author: Casey Brown
topics.content: I'm having trouble sleeping. Any suggestions for a better sleep routine?

replies.author: Morgan Taylor
replies.content: I've been using a blue light filter on my devices and it's made a big difference!
